name: Pennie Bland
text: We are way back to Iowa after visiting my daughter in Colorado and decided we needed a break from the weather by stopping to get something to eat.  We asked Google where we could find a buffet because there is 5 of us.    Google came up …More

name: mario fierro
text: Always love this place to eat at! The name game is by far the best! I was able to eat for free! Thank you God Fathers! Absolutely killing the pizza game!

name: Lynn Cleland
text: I've eaten at GF longer than most people have been alive and without a doubt, this was the worst. I waited over 40 minutes for anything that was fresh and when I got there all there was was dried up pizza that had been sitting out there for …More

name: Vicki Gentry
text: I visited this place while out shopping with a friend I take care of. She is in a wheelchair and the tables and chairs were so close together that it was hard for her to maneuver her chair around without pulling tables and chairs behind …More

name: Peggy Spinner
text: Excellent customer service. The employees went above and beyond with making our dining experience enjoyable. We highly recommend.

name: Cheri Clark
text: We stopped in for lunch during our 30th wedding anniversary trip.  Why?  Because we love their pizza.  Pizza was as wonderful as ever and the guy behind the counter was great.  Friendly, informative and helpful.  Thanks for such a nice visit.

name: T B
text: Meh. Godfather's has some excellent pizzas,but their buffet is beyond words for how extremely disappointing and unpleasant it is. There is no variety and everything was out if you weren't up there immediately,and it was the staples,like …More

name: Landon Blank
text: Great Food but bus girl rolled her eyes and picked our food with disgust. She grunted at us my friend tevin didn't eat his entire pizza. There enough tables for all 16 of so very crowded

name: Dianne Brown
text: Had a delivery on Friday night and when was the taco pizza and the other was a meat lovers Pizza with extra cheese and the taco pizza didn't have much meat on it at all and the meat lovers Pizza had no extra cheese on it whatsoever and it …More

name: Raelene Waltemath
text: We like the cinnamon  balls better than the dessert  pizza. My husbands favorite  place. We eat there  often. Friendly staff.

name: kim woodill
text: Food sucked. Pizza was dry and nasty. Pasta bar was watery. Will not eat there again and will tell all my friends not to spend there money.

name: Kyla Bailley
text: The food is good but dining in is terrible there is prompt service and then there is the lady standing there 2 foot from my table just waiting for my empty plate.  Also the new seating arrangement is terrible.  There is no privacy and no matter where you are you are in someone's way.  This is sad Because we do like to eat here.

name: Orlando Ferguson
text: The place is really nice staff is great food is good delivery i awesome too check them out

name: ryan ziel
text: Godfathers is the best pizza in North Platte. Love the bufet.

name: Cory Christon
text: I haven't had godfathers in years.  I thought that they were all closed.  This one did not disappoint.

name: Jake Schweitzer
text: Very good food and service. Love there buffet. Great bang for your buck.

name: norman rankin
text: After many years they still have some of the better pizza

name: Ramona Heberly
text: Happy about the nightly buffet that they just implemented. Food is good.

name: John Jones
text: Buffet table well stocked the entire restaurant was clean and friendly staff

name: colby pell
text: The GM is a very rude and inconsiderate person. I will never eat there again

name: Priscilla Ann
text: Cashier was very rude and rushy towards us , and we didn't get what we ordered at all.  We drove 7 hours from Colorado to Nebraska and was hoping it was a good lunch spot but it really wasn't.

name: Jim Woodcock
text: Great Buffet especially in the evening Monday through Saturday highly recommend

name: Joseph Hester
text: They have an amazing buffet.  Love the monkey bread that they make.

name: Russell Gutherless
text: Good pizza one if the best in town.

name: Dannoshayne Ozuna endicott
text: Nice service and greeting from manager great choices on their buffet

name: Kathy Martinez
text: Good food, good service!

name: Jeremy Crary
text: Pricey but delicious.

name: Ed Mravinc
text: Great pizza, dine-in and delivery, good prices

name: Julian Bouck
text: Good food and good customer service.

name: Theresa Shelton
text: Great service and nice buffet

name: Michelle Fletcher
text: Major improvements from the last time I was here! Buffet was fresh and food was good!

name: Renee Ohlson
text: Got a free buffet,,,my name was on the list,,,yayyyy,,,anyway ,looove god fathers pizza

name: robert woracek
text: Go for the buffet.  Its ok

name: Cindy Smith
text: Great hot speedy food

name: Skyler Bagnell
text: Tables were discussing even the ones the girl wiped off still had food crumbs all over chairs still had food all over and floors has food ground into it.

name: Steven Paul
text: A great place to eat

name: JoNasty
text: Pretty good

name: Shane Stout
text: Good quick lunch!!

name: Rob W
text: Best pizza in town!!

name: Jay Gifford
text: Great pizza

text: Great buffet

name: Edna Jones
text: Awesome

name: Kristi Land
text: Love it great food

name: caleb Marshall
text: Do not get the chicken bacon ranch pizza. It was horrible. Very dry tasting. Couldn't even eat it

name: Wesley Shackelford
text: Good experience

name: Joseph Carty
text: Their thick crust is pretty good.

name: David Hughes
text: Good pizza

name: Lucas buss
text: Cold food

name: Sara Zogg
text: Smiling faces from staff the moment we walked in. I mentioned a pizza I saw on FB and they made their version of the same thing!

name: Mark Van Der Heyen
text: Good food

name: Tish Griesfeller
text: Always great, hot, and fresh food!!

name: David Coulter
text: So slow to deliver. Looking for a pizza delivered, this is not the place. It was cold and yucky. Learned my lesson.

name: Jarred Goossen
text: Wierd

name: Virginia Adams
text: Awesome food

text: Super nice folks with an excellent buffet!
